Dispute_Type: Ownership and infringement of copyright in the Ruhl tachograph chart
Legal_Issue: Whether there is a genuine issue for trial regarding copyright ownership and infringement
Evidence_Assessment: Plaintiff relies on registration as evidence; defendants provide counter-evidence of long-standing agreements and lack of awareness of registration
Burden_of_Proof: Plaintiff bears burden to establish copyright ownership and infringement
Credibility_Factor: Unresolved credibility issues regarding ownership and knowledge of registration
Legal_Rule: Registration under the Copyright Act is evidence of copyright existence and ownership; summary judgment granted only if no genuine issue of material fact
Standard_of_Review: Summary judgment standard – whether a genuine issue for trial exists
Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged unauthorized use of the Ruhl tachograph chart protected by copyright
Outcome_on_Merits: Not decided; case proceeds to trial
Review_Standard: De novo review of legal standards, factual disputes preclude summary judgment
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Defendants had opportunity to present counter-evidence
Key_Evidence_Considered: Copyright registration, long-standing agreements, timing of awareness of registration
Applicant_Challenge: Plaintiff's attempt to obtain summary judgment
Court_Result: Denial of summary judgment, case to proceed to trial
Standard_of_Proof: Preponderance of evidence standard applicable at trial
Defendant_Response: Challenged ownership and asserted lack of knowledge of registration until 1992
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence (registration), contractual agreements, factual assertions
Remedy_Requested: Summary judgment in favor of plaintiff
Remedy_Sought: Recognition of copyright infringement and damages
Authority: Federal court with jurisdiction over copyright claims
Legal_Provision_Cited: Copyright Act provisions on registration and infringement
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: No allegation of inadmissibility; dispute centers on validity and ownership
Applicable_Process: Civil litigation process under Federal Rules of Civil Procedure
Outcome_of_Review: Summary judgment not granted due to genuine factual disputes
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Summary judgment motion was pending and denied
Jurisdiction: Federal jurisdiction based on copyright law
Governing_Rule: Federal Rules of Civil Procedure Rule 56 – Summary Judgment
